subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The car tuner.auto sweep--noise 	reduction--seperated
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Amazing how many words and letters I leave out, need to remember spell
check!

Yeah, the entities seem to like the car tuners as well. About the only
difference is the antenna input, the car tuners don't use the ferrite rod
antenna, they use a tuned RF amplifier front end. RF=radio frequency.

 F-S

On Wed, Jun 9, 2010 at 5:38 PM, jennifer <3eyesofwisdom@...> wrote:

>
>
> There might be something to the car tuners. I had a very weird experience.
> If I told a psychiatrist he would shout schizo. I think people receive
> messages from their radio all the time, but in another way. That is
> advertising. But I was in the car and kept pushing the different buttons for
> the different radio stations. I felt like I was being communicated to. With
> strange gifts, perhaps I knew when to change the station. Anyways, maybe
> there is something to this. I am excited to work on my own projects when the
> house is put together and I have more funds.
> And Snowfire, I will pray. Thank you for your kind words.
> Jennifer
